snippet: In a statement, the wife of a Jefferies managing director said the two had reached an “amicable custody arrangement.” She also seemed to take back some of the lurid details reported in the media.
abstract: In a statement, the wife of a Jefferies managing director said the two had reached an “amicable custody arrangement.” She also seemed to take back some of the lurid details reported in the media.

headline.main: Custody Agreement Reached in Investment Banker's Messy Divorce
